title: leaver buster?
body: ive just gotten a leaver buster warning after my completed game which in itself shouldnt  be a thing right? i havent left any of my games, mid game at all what so ever , i during the game had a 3 sec black out but was imminently brought back to my game and then was slapped with a warning ????? which just makes no sense. you know a leaverbuster warning for a non-leaver can i get some help here ??

replies.body: That warning came from that little blackout period you mentioned. The game detected that you were out of the match long enough for it to possibly have made a big difference, so you still got flagged with that warning.
